LanguageData.VNPE.MustOverBed: Must be placed over a bed or an enterable building.
LanguageData.VNPE.StorageSetting: Stop drawing if storage is {0} full
LanguageData.VNPE.TransfuseSetting: Transfuse if pawn has {0} of blood or less
